import React from "react"; import sibert3 from '../assets/sibert3.png'; function Blades() { return (

Blades | Knives - Axes

  • Overview:

    • A little breakdown on the limitless variety of knives and edged tools. Generally speaking you get what you pay for. I use a variety of knives and axes for a variety of jobs.

  • Knife Types:

    • There are two main knife types.
    • Fixed Blade Knives
      • Fixed blade knives have various tang types. The tang is the portion of the knife that extends into the handle.
      • Full Tang
      • Through Tang
      • Hidden Tang
      • Stick Tang
      • Rat Tang
    • Folding Knives
      • Folding knives have various blade locking features to be aware of for safe use. Here are a few in no particular order.
      • Slip-joint - no locking feature
      • Friction Fit - no locking featture
      • Liner Lock
      • Frame Lock
      • Button Lock
      There are many ways various maufacturers implement their lock features, and some have their own patented systems. Stay familiar with the operation of your folding knives, especially automatics.

  • Blade Types:

  • Knife Types:
    • Based game with immutable blockchain contracts. Testing level with basic outlines and story structure complete. Basic features like swap and social connections working.
  • Blade Types:
    • Major game upgrade to B class, including big expansion of collectible NFT's. Avatar upgrades. Graphics and gameplay upgrade. Story expansion. Maybe additional contracts, core immutable contracts obviously unchanged. Use capital from V1 to fund community inspired game expansion. Major social interactive spaces enabled.
  • Steel types:
    • Last major upgrade to Alpha class, before game moves into predictible upgrade cycle. Solidify metaverse game structure including lands and buildings for trading.

    ); } export default Blades;
